author: han0110
content:
Hello, would like to give some updates on the EWS:

- zkboost is now integrated into EWS, we can submit real proof to CLs now.
- Added an deployment example [here](https://github.com/eth-act/zkboost/tree/master/docker/example/testnet), it spins up a local testnet using `kurtosis` with 3 normal CLs + 3 optional-proofs CLs, and EWS + zkboost + 2 ZisK prover with different EL guest programs, if running with 4 GPUs for each prover, the proof submission can keep up with the 12 seconds empty block slot.
- Tried to update the EWS launcher in `ethpandaops/ethereum-package` [here](https://github.com/ethpandaops/ethereum-package/compare/main...han0110:ethereum-package:han/feature/update-ews), it launches an additional service `zkboost` that is used by `ews` to request proof, also updated the example to produce mock proof as before. To deploy them with real prover it'd need to launch more services like the docker compose in the testnet example, not sure if it makes sense to put everything into `ews_launcher.star` so I didn't do it.
